actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two Thundering Stone Club or Boulder attacks in any combination.

actions.name: Thundering Stone Club
entries: Melee atk +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 16 (3d6 + 6 damage) bludgeoning damage. The giant can cause the club to emit a burst of thunderous energy that deals 10 (3d6 damage) thunder damage to each creature, other than the giant, within 30 feet of the target. The club can emit a burst this way only once per turn.

actions.name: Boulder
entries: Ranged atk +10 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 19 (3d8 + 6 damage) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or have the {@condition prone} condition. After the giant throws the boulder, roll a {@dice d6}; on a roll of 3 or lower, the giant has no more boulders to throw.
